des: "Bleu Cheese dressing has many uses at any appetizer party. It can be served with vegetable sticks or as a dip for other appetizers, like chicken wings."
ins: In a small mixing bowl, combine mayonnaise, onion, garlic, parsley, sour cream, lemon juice, vinegar, and blue cheese.  Season with salt and pepper to taste.  Cover, and refrigerate for at least one hour before serving.
